markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=13)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 318 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Aakriti](/Deities.aspx?ID=261), [Balumbdar](/Deities.aspx?ID=224), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28), [Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196), [Hearth and Harvest](/Deities.aspx?ID=252), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=42)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 8 hours
</row>

</column>

---

You reinforce the target's musculoskeletal system to bear more weight. The target can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.
name: Ant Haul

text: Ant Haul Source Core Rulebook pg. 318 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Aakriti, Balumbdar, Droskar, Droskar, Dwarven Pantheon, Hearth and Harvest, Kurgess Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 8 hours --- You reinforce the target's musculoskeletal system to bear more weight. The target can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.
